channel.title: Running A Client Under Linux
channel.description:
Chances are that I am not the only Linux user out there. Because of this, I am writing this guide. Hopefully this will help any Linux users who join our community. Please note that I am running Ubuntu, so if you are using a different distribution, the installation protocol may vary. You can find all the download links at the bottom of this post.
I. Installing Wine
1. Go to Applications --> Add Remove... 2. In the search bar type in "wine" 3. Use the check-box to select "Wine Microsoft Windows Compatibility Layer" and click "Apply changes" 4. Enter your password when it prompts and just wait for it to finish installing
II. Installing Java on wine
1. Download "Java JDK" and "Java JRE" 2. Right click on the file you just downloaded, and select "Open With Other Application..." 3. Scroll down and select "Wine Windows Program Loader" 4. Accept the agreement and install java
Files: 1. Java JRE: https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewProductDetail-Start?ProductRef=jre-6u21-oth-JPR@CDS-CDS_Developer 2. Java JDK: http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/widget/jdk6.jsp
-dragonman2

item.title: Running A Client Under Linux
item.dc:creator: @dragonman2 dragonman2
item.description:
@dragonman2 wrote:

Chances are that I am not the only Linux user out there. Because of this, I am writing this guide. Hopefully this will help any Linux users who join our community. Please note that I am running Ubuntu, so if you are using a different distribution, the installation protocol may vary. You can find all the download links at the bottom of this post.

I. Installing Wine

  1. Go to Applications --> Add Remove...
  2. In the search bar type in "wine"
  3. Use the check-box to select  "Wine Microsoft Windows Compatibility Layer" and click "Apply changes"
  4. Enter your password when it prompts and just wait for it to finish installing

II. Installing Java on wine

  1. Download "Java JDK" and "Java JRE"
  2. Right click on the file you just downloaded, and select "Open With Other Application..."
  3. Scroll down and select "Wine Windows Program Loader"
  4. Accept the agreement and install java

Files:

  1. Java JRE: https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewProductDetail-Start?ProductRef=jre-6u21-oth-JPR@CDS-CDS_Developer
  2. Java JDK: http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/widget/jdk6.jsp

-dragonman2
